events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer role and will begin review shortly.
The candidate's application has been categorised under the engineering department focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to manage this software engineer candidate throughout the recruitment process.
The initial screening interview was conducted and the candidate showed strong knowledge in software development principles.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in proceeding with the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess coding skills, problem-solving abilities, and system design.
